title: Relationship when X and Y are complementary

content.question: If the demand for good Y increases as the price of good X decreases, it can be concluded that

choices.label: X and Y are substitute goods
X and Y are complementary goods
X is an inferior good and Y is a superior good
X is a superior good and Y is an inferior good
both X and Y are inferior goods

content.answer: X and Y are complementary goods

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
